pros: Shalom House will provide you with a job that you can believe in. The rewards are unlike most other jobs- you are working towards helping a fellow individual succeed despite significant barriers.
cons: It's the humanitarian jobs that are the lowest paid- they have low perceived value in society, so working here won't get you the Bentley.
